long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A google-chrome extension which allows English and Russian language learners to save time while studying!

V 0.2 - Check out the new feature 
Select any Russian word and right click on it, and throught the context menus you can access all the main buttons.

Buttons in the Context menus do not save the word in the extension.

We are aware of this and will try to implement it in future updates as soon as possible!
